org.apache.flink.runtime.net

类 ConnectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.net.ConnectionUtils

  • public class ConnectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities to determine the network interface and address that should be used to bind the TaskManager communication to.

    Implementation note: This class uses System.nanoTime() to measure elapsed time, because that is not susceptible to clock changes.

    • 嵌套类概要

      A LeaderRetrievalListener that allows retrieving an InetAddress for the current leader.

    • 方法详细资料

      • findConnectingAddress

        public static java.net.InetAddress findConnectingAddress(java.net.InetSocketAddress targetAddress,
                                                         long maxWaitMillis,
                                                         long startLoggingAfter)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Finds the local network address from which this machine can connect to the target address. This method tries to establish a proper network connection to the given target, so it only succeeds if the target socket address actually accepts connections. The method tries various strategies multiple times and uses an exponential backoff timer between tries.

        If no connection attempt was successful after the given maximum time, the method will choose some address based on heuristics (excluding link-local and loopback addresses.)

        This method will initially not log on info level (to not flood the log while the backoff time is still very low). It will start logging after a certain time has passes.

        参数:
        targetAddress - The address that the method tries to connect to.
        maxWaitMillis - The maximum time that this method tries to connect, before falling back to the heuristics.
        startLoggingAfter - The time after which the method will log on INFO level.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • tryLocalHostBeforeReturning

        private static java.net.InetAddress tryLocalHostBeforeReturning(java.net.InetAddress preliminaryResult,
                                                                java.net.SocketAddress targetAddress,
                                                                boolean logging)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        This utility method tries to connect to the JobManager using the InetAddress returned by InetAddress.getLocalHost(). The purpose of the utility is to have a final try connecting to the target address using the LocalHost before using the address returned. We do a second try because the JM might have been unavailable during the first check.
        参数:
        preliminaryResult - The address detected by the heuristic
        返回:
        either the preliminaryResult or the address returned by InetAddress.getLocalHost() (if we are able to connect to targetAddress from there)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • findAddressUsingStrategy

        private static java.net.InetAddress findAddressUsingStrategy(ConnectionUtils.AddressDetectionState strategy,
                                                             java.net.InetSocketAddress targetAddress,
                                                             boolean logging)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Try to find a local address which allows as to connect to the targetAddress using the given strategy.
        参数:
        strategy - Depending on the strategy, the method will enumerate all interfaces, trying to connect to the target address
        targetAddress - The address we try to connect to
        logging - Boolean indicating the logging verbosity
        返回:
        null if we could not find an address using this strategy, otherwise, the local address.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • hasCommonPrefix

        private static boolean hasCommonPrefix(byte[] address,
                                       byte[] address2)
        Checks if two addresses have a common prefix (first 2 bytes). Example: 192.168.???.??? Works also with ipv6, but accepts probably too many addresses

      • tryToConnect

        private static boolean tryToConnect(java.net.InetAddress fromAddress,
                                    java.net.SocketAddress toSocket,
                                    int timeout,
                                    boolean logFailed)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        参数:
        fromAddress - The address to connect from.
        toSocket - The socket address to connect to.
        timeout - The timeout fr the connection.
        logFailed - Flag to indicate whether to log failed attempts on info level (failed attempts are always logged on DEBUG level).
        返回:
        True, if the connection was successful, false otherwise.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the socket cleanup fails.
